title: The Constant Gardener
creator_credit: Blue Sky Films, Scion Films, Studio Babelsberg, Epsilon Motion Pictures, UK Film Council, Focus Features, Potboiler Productions, Odile Dicks-Mireaux, Tracey Seaward, Thierry Potok, Simon Channing Williams, Fernando Meirelles, Mark Tildesley, Jeffrey Caine and Henning Molfenter
headline_credit: China, Germany, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2005
brief_description: Justin Quayle is a low-level British diplomat who has always gone about his work very quietly, not causing any problems. But after his radical wife Tessa is killed he becomes determined to find out why, thrusting himself into the middle of a very dangerous conspiracy.

constellations_other.name: My People
constellations_other.description: The breakout single for Sydney dance duo The Presets, 'My People' was one of the biggest hits of 2007 and propelled by the engaging music video.
